ComicInfo.Summary:
Fueled by an unsettling discovery that makes their mission all the more urgent, the Defiant crew come face to face with the god killer.Written by Star Trek: Year Five duo Jackson Lanzing and Collin Kelly (Batman Beyond, Captain America) and illustrated by Ramon Rosanas (Star Wars), IDW's brand-new flagship Star Trek ongoing series continues the bold adventure!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-24 04:24:04. [CVDB967904]
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/star-trek-4/4000-967904/

ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Caspar Wijngaard, Joe Quinones, Marcus To, Ramon Rosanas
ComicInfo.Characters: Benjamin Sisko, Data, Dr. Beverly Crusher, Emperor Kahless II, Jake Sisko, Lily Sato, Montgomery Scott, T'Lir, Tom Paris, Worf
